Class InlineMenuRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.menu.InlineMenuRow

  • public class InlineMenuRow
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class to represent a list of button in a row.
    Author:
    Mazen Kotb
